name: Erin Go Bragh - Irish Coffee Cigarillo
additionalNotes: Erin Go Bragh is a uniquely infused premium long-filler handmade with a gourmet blend. Erin Go Bragh soothes the palate with an enticing infusion of Irish whisky mellowed by creamy nuances and a slightly-sweetened cap. these They offer a smooth and satisfying smoke filled with mellow flavors and pleasant aromas. The Irish Creme offers an especially nice experience with a sweet, creamy, crowd-pleasing aroma.
